Articles.Content:
I remember reading some articles on the Eurocopter X3. A Helicopter with two propeller engines instead of a tail rotor. Since the Firespitter mod only had a small helicopter cockpit, I had to find the right kind of engines (other than the main rotor) of the right size. I finally settled on using two small VTOL engines. After some tinkering, I finally got it working. I had to place control surfaces at the front to compensate for the CoL being far back...

Javascript is disabled. View full album
